duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and troubleshoot PACS, RIS, and voice recognition dictation system.
Coordinate with Systems Services to ensure data integrity for radiology studies.
Repair broken exams/studies and ensure data integrity in the system.
Develop and document operating procedures and workflow processes.
Provide training on new applications, implementation requirements, and troubleshooting.
Serve as a liaison among internal groups and vendors for digital imaging initiatives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent combination of education and experience. (Equivalency is Associates degree plus 5 years’ experience with medium to large scale PACS and Radiology Information Systems (RIS) in the capacity of PACS administrator.)
